title: On the idea of putting mages in the jungle
body:
Why not give a few of them broken passives similar to Nid that only apply to jungle mobs?  If it's ok for her to permalock a jungle mob out of range and take no dmg, then it should be ok for other mages as well, right?

Haha downvoted.  Gotta love the forums.  How about a reason?

replies.body: You'd need more than a Nidalee root. Nid doesn't jungle just because she can CC the camps, she jungles because she has sustain and a way to give herself persistent DPS (AS steroid) early on. She was just a really easy AP champion to push into the jungle, but you'd need to work a lot harder with most other ones.

> [{quoted}](name=MotherTeresa1910,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=xHePAXcw,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-07-24T21:42:32.165+0000)
>
> You'd need more than a Nidalee root. Nid doesn't jungle just because she can CC the camps, she jungles because she has sustain and a way to give herself persistent DPS (AS steroid) early on. She was just a really easy AP champion to push into the jungle, but you'd need to work a lot harder with most other ones.

True, but some of them feel like they are almost there now and only need a smaller boost.  A similar skill could make guys like Ziggs or Brand fairly legit in the jungle.

I think what ap junglers need is better sustain in the jungle. like if regen runes/items gave more out of battle and the like. 
or if spellvamp quints wore worth while.

> or if spellvamp quints wore worth while.

Hmm that gave me a neat idea.  What if spellvamp runes(and perhaps some other ones) gave additional bonuses vs jungle mobs?
